    • direction

      public void direction(LngLat destination, LngLat current) throws IOException
      This function deals with the whole movement of the drone
      Parameters:
      destination - Coordinate where the drone must go
      current - Current position of the drone
      Throws:
      IOException - When can't find URL

    • helper

      public void helper()
      This helper function basically has all the coordinates of the noflyzones

    • getNoFly

      public boolean getNoFly(Double x0, Double y0, Double x1, Double y1)
      Parameters:
      x0 - Coordinates for the drone position now
      y0 - Coordinates for the drone position now
      x1 - Coordinates for the next drone position
      y1 - Coordinates for the next drone position
      Returns:
      False if the drone is not about to intersect the noFly zone else true
